emuInput.TitMainTitle: Groom Wilbert Hawkins and bride Virginia Sumlin Hawkins posed with wedding party, including best man William Redman, matron of honor Gloria Lane, and bridesmaids Dorothy Greenlee and Marion Powell posed in front of dark curtain
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 8, 1947, pg. 11, reads: "Wedding Party - Mr. and Mrs. Wilbert Hawkins posed with their wedding party for the photographer. Bridesmaids were Miss Dorothy Greenlee and Miss Marion Powell. Matron of honor was Mrs. Gloria Lane, the bride's sister. Best man was William Redman. The bride is the former Miss Virginia Sumlin. - Harris Photo."
